verbose_text: Cilostazol, another drug in the combination treatment in this study, is an inhibitor of type 3 phosphodiesterase that exerts antiplatelet activity through the suppression of cAMP degradation and also has pleiotropic effects against inflammation on vascular function and atherosclerosis.
evidence: Cilostazol, another drug in the combination treatment in this study, is an inhibitor of type 3 phosphodiesterase
